summary: As every summer, Georges Lajoie, his wife Ginette and grown-up son Léon go on holiday to Loulou's campsite. They join old friends, the Schumachers and the Colins. Brigitte Colin, the ... See full summary »
cast: Jean Carmet|Pierre Tornade|Jean Bouise|Michel Peyrelon|Ginette Garcin|Pascale Roberts|Jean-Pierre Marielle|Robert Castel|Pino Caruso|Isabelle Huppert|Jacques Chailleux|Henri Garcin|Odile Poisson|Victor Lanoux|Mohamed Zinet|Paul Bonifas|Abderrahmane Benkloua|Salah Boukhalfi|Jean-Claude Braganti|François Cadet|Pierre Collet|Jean-Jacques Delbo|Bernard Dumaine|Bernard Fontaine|Marcel Gassouk|Jean Lemaître|Carlo Nell|Jacques Préboist|Boumediene Oumer|Jacques Ramade|Jean-Claude Rémoleux|Marco Sauer|Jacques Villeret|Charles Woltz
title: Crónica de una violación
